article:
Having visited quite a few places of interest and had a wonderful time, Mrs. Smith bought a lot of things including two expensive overcoats and was now on a return ship.Time   _  .
The ship was at the end of its long trip and the people in it were waiting to get off. Mrs. Smith looked very   _  .She bought two expensive overcoats during the trip, but the Customs allowed each passenger to have   _   one overcoat.What should she do?Suddenly she saw a poor young lady on   the other   side of the ship.She had a good   _  .She went over there and took her to a   _   place.No one could hear what they talked   _  .They first said "Hello!" to each other.Then Mrs. Smith asked politely, "Would you be   _   enough to do something for me?" "Of course. What's that?" "I have two overcoats and can't be let   _  .Will you put this on, please?They will   _   you take it into the country," Mrs. Smith   _  .
At first the young lady refused but some time later she   gave in  .The young lady was surprised to find the overcoat was very   _   on her and she felt very happy because she never had a coat like that in her   _  .
"Remember,"said the rich woman."Don't tell anyone about   _   we had said and done and don't look at me   _   when we are through."
The two women left the ship safely. No   _   happened to either of them.   However  ,when the rich woman asked the young lady to give   _   her overcoat,the young lady said,"I am sorry. I don't know you. This is my overcoat.   _   should I give it to you?"
